name: Overview

[{"id":"33d57bf3-e422-4f09-b114-2eff3915a7bb","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: update_change","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d86377d0-524a-437c-8967-deaa47bed302","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"update_change","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function is a state-synchronization utility nested within ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"popStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Its primary role is to "commit" the side effects of a code block (like a function or a conditional branch) once the analyzer has finished processing it. It takes a dictionary of modifications—representing variables whose values were changed inside the block—and officially applies those updates to the definitions in their original parent scopes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bcf02aa4-db56-4edf-aa36-b0cc20b6bac4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Static analysis must account for how functions or blocks impact the global program state. If a function ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"setup_config()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is analyzed and found to modify a variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"TIMEOUT","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in the module scope, that change shouldn't just exist inside the function analysis; it must be propagated back out. This function ensures that once the analyzer "leaves" the function, the updated value of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"TIMEOUT","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is visible to all subsequent code.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d30d6ddd-8c86-4033-ba33-94d1472a8c35","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8832dd78-069c-4ab5-81b2-d8a98c4a1a1b","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Iterate Modifications:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It loops through a dictionary where the keys are fully qualified namespaces (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main.CONFIG.timeout","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") and the values are the new data found during analysis.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8e85b4a5-fee1-4913-9912-3443fc9bdfd2","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Location:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" For each changed variable, it uses ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"get_scope_ns","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to find exactly where that variable lives (e.g., identifying that ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"timeout","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" belongs in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"main.CONFIG","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" scope).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"608abd77-b777-4758-ae59-8e617b332f26","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Definition Update:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"f5bcd403-731a-4f60-9b26-2bcfd23537c6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It retrieves the existing Definition object for the variable. If the variable was created dynamically and has no definition yet, it creates a new ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"NAME_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7554933d-a923-4b32-a780-f5781a89e818","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add_value_point","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to record the new value at the specific line number where the "pop" (exit) occurred.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"ec582b9b-d5f8-4d1c-832f-fdbd5149c7dc","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Registration:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It ensures the definition is correctly registered in the parent scope, linking the simple field name (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"timeout","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") to the updated definition.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"45b55478-8373-42b1-83ff-4647adc1dcec","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Imagine a function ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"set_ready()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" that modifies a module-level variable ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"IS_READY","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"966bb7eb-e884-4489-a41e-b0e24f071d53","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"While inside ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"set_ready()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the analyzer records: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.IS_READY","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" -> ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1291330b-65e8-428b-b82e-a848fa828460","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"popStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is called for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"set_ready()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it invokes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"update_change","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" with this record.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"410029b0-ef23-4836-ab9b-0edf559ac660","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"update_change","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" finds the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"37cb0733-6355-4ec0-aec6-c1a02edca93d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It finds the definition for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module.IS_READY","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"765b8099-83a9-4db7-a3d5-13593756e001","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It adds ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"IS_READY","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"'s value history.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a86cd838-4960-43f5-a3f5-0c50f44b2259","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The analyzer continues. Any code after the call to ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"set_ready()","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" now correctly identifies ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"IS_READY","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"True","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6c5a8d89-de06-45ba-a63e-beb9249c857f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
